amendment.description: To amend the Trafficking Victims Protection Act of 2000 to expand the training for Federal Government personnel related to trafficking in persons, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 312 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 312 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Brown.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 312 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Brown.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 312 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
